text: Queen's Covers (TC: 聽后感) is a Mandopop album by Edmond Leung, who has been active since 1990, which is his 2nd studio album in Mandarin. ==Track listing== #Step By Step (一步步) #You Exist In My Song (我的歌聲裡) #Bravery (勇氣) #I'm Not Sad (我不難過) #Conquer (征服) #Better Halves (半邊生命) ==Music awards== {| class="wikitable" !width=60|Year !width="350"|Ceremony !width="450"|Award |- | align="center" | 2014 | IFPI Hong Kong Top Sales Music Award 2014 | 10 Top Best Sales Releases, Mandarin - Queen's Covers (聽后感) |} ==References== Category:Edmond Leung albums Category:2014 albums Category:Mandarin-language albums
title: Queen's Covers
